mapper.select: select ft.feedNo, (select count(*) from feed_like where feed_like.feedNo = ft.feedNo) as 'count' from feed_tag ft, tag t, feed f where ft.tagNo = t.no and t.name = #{name} and f.no = ft.feedNo and f.date between date_add(now(),interval -1 MONTH) and now() order by count desc;
select no, nickname, profile_img as profileImg from user where nickname like CONCAT(#{name},'%');
select f.no f.descr f.author f.date from feed f, feed_tag ft where f.no = ft.feedNo and ft.tagNo in ( select t.no from tag t where t.name = #{name} )
